## ToolboxCategory.createLabelDom\_() method

Creates the span that holds the category label. This should have an ID for accessibility purposes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected createLabelDom_(name: string): Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the category.  The span that holds the category label. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Element
